name: 44-pagination
description: * Write a script that reads `movie_titles.csv`, parses it and populates   a MongoDB database. * Write a server endpoint that returns movies   * `?q=` The endpoint should be queryable by title   * `?min=` The endpoint should be queryable by min-year   * `?max=` The endpoint should be queryable by max-year   * `?count=` The endpoint should return results 100 at time   * `?page=` The endpoint should support pagination
